summary: Xwm Ninja is a tool that converts between xWMA (*.xwm) and a variety of other formats. It uses Microsoft's xWMAEncode.exe to encode into xWMA, and FFmpeg to encode into all the other formats.
descriptionHtml:
Xwm Ninja is a tool that converts between xWMA (*.xwm) and a variety of other formats. It uses Microsoft's xWMAEncode.exe to encode into xWMA, and FFmpeg to encode into all the other formats.

To use, unpack the files into a new folder, and run "Xwm Ninja.exe". See the included readme file for details.
[line]
[color=#ffaf37][size=4][b][u]New in v1.5[/u][/b][/size][/color]

[list]
[*]bug fix: deleting items from the queue no longer causes an incorrect directory structure to be used
[*]bug fix: selecting queue items with the keyboard now works properly
[*]changed the progress bar text (from % completed to x/y items processed)
[*]the usual minor improvements
[/list]
If anyone finds a bug, post about it in the bugs section and I'll be happy to fix it.
author: greentea101

files.name: Xwn Ninja
files.changelogHtml:
bug fix: deleting items from the queue no longer causes an incorrect directory structure to be used
bug fix: selecting queue items with the keyboard now works properly
changed the progress bar text (from % completed to x/y items processed)
the usual minor improvements
